title: Stephan Papadakis
description:
Stephan Papadakis is a sport compact racing legend. He has a ridiculous amount of trophies and records for fast FWD drag cars, Formula Drift cars driven by Foust and Aasbo, and is now building a 1,000 HP 2020 Toyota Supra engine to show what the platform is capable of!

This show is also a video: https://youtu.be/_nGPWv1yDOo

 

Want to learn about engines? Watch Steph's channel! 

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVDKsGMP27sI-7P-r6cTWVQ

https://papadakisracing.com/

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman @stephpapadakis

 

NEW SHIRTS!

https://www.blipshift.com/tst
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
